New Records: Fazalhaq Farooqi achieved the best bowling figures of 5/9 in the match.
Key Match Events: Rahmanullah Gurbaz scored 76 runs off 45 balls.
Ibrahim Zadran scored 70 runs off 46 balls.
Fazalhaq Farooqi took 5 wickets for 9 runs.
Rashid Khan took 2 wickets for 12 runs.
Pre-Game Insights: Uganda won the toss and elected to field first.
Post-Match Reflections: Fazalhaq Farooqi was named Player of the Match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Providence Stadium, Guyana.
Uganda was bowled out for 58 runs in 16 overs.
